SELECT
FROM auctionRecord ar LEFT JOIN auctionUser u ON ar.userId = u.userId LEFT JOIN auction a ON ar.auctionId = a.auctionId WHERE ar.id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM auctionRecord ar LEFT JOIN auctionUser u ON ar.userId = u.userId LEFT JOIN auction a ON ar.auctionId = a.auctionId ORDER BY ar.auctionTime DESC

SELECT
FROM auctionRecord ar LEFT JOIN auctionUser u ON ar.userId = u.userId LEFT JOIN auction a ON ar.auctionId = a.auctionId WHERE ar.auctionId = #{auctionId} ORDER BY ar.auctionPrice DESC, ar.auctionTime ASC

FROM auctionRecord ar LEFT JOIN auctionUser u ON ar.userId = u.userId LEFT JOIN auction a ON ar.auctionId = a.auctionId WHERE ar.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY ar.auctionTime DESC
